summary: This mod enhance bridges in all Skyrim more than adding one lantern - it makes more general changes like plants, trees, benches e.t.c
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-wAQ-wau08sk/UTpCLE4gK1I/AAAAAAAAACw/YyOkGYaPP9U/s800/My%2520mod%2520screenshot%2528znapisem%2529.jpg[/img]

This mod simply adds some nice ( in my opinion ) things to bridges and make them look better.

Currently this mod isn\'t compatibile with Lanterns of Skyrim All-in one. Some on lanterns are placed where my candles are and it doesn\'t work good.

This mod enhances some bridges in Skyrim more than adding one lantern - it makes more general changes like plants, trees, benches e.t.c 

Scripts turning lights on and off are added and working properly.


For now I have some bridge finished

- 2 bridges near Whiterun
- Bridge on road to Windhelm
- Half moon mill bridge
- Bridge on road from Whiterun to Windhelm ( near waterfall )
- First big bridge when you go out Markarth

Mod is no longer updated due to me moving to another project.

Thanks to Bethasda for creating awesome Skyrim and for 
MannyGT creator of Skyrim lanterns mod  which can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18916

Also available on steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=47186293
author: Nevervell
